comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: During the visit to Tanganyika for the Constitutional Conference, March 1961. The people in the front of the picture are, from left to right, Lady Turnbull; "Mwalimu" Julius Nyerere; Mrs Macleod; Sir John Fletcher-Cooke, CMG, Deputy Governor (behind); HE Sir Richard Turnbull, KCMG, Governor of Tanganyika; The Rt Hon Iain Macleod, MP, Secretary of State for the Colonies.
